name: Sorting Incorporated
description:
Game time: 10 minutes - 1 hour if you suck.

Sorting Incorporated is a totally normal game that takes itself seriously, I swear.

You sort boxes, that's it. Maybe it's funny?

This project developed from a small test in unity that just kept growing in concept. I'm going to school for game design, and this is the first project I pushed myself to make it feel like a complete game with settings, a pause menu, and a tutorial. I learned a lot with this project. I'm ready to put it to rest though.

The coding, art, menus, and music were all made by me.
